sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { getSunTime, getWindDirection } from '../helpers' import { forecastType } from '../types' import Feels from './Icons/Feels' import Wind from './Icons/Wind' import Sunrise from './Icons/Sunrise' import Sunset from './Icons/Sunset' import Tile from './Tiles' type Props = { data: forecastType } const Degree = ({ temp }: { temp: number }): JSX.Element => ( {temp}o ) const Forecast = ({ data }: Props): JSX.Element => { const today = data.list[0] return (

{data.name} {data.country}

{today.weather[0].main} {today.weather[0].description}

H: L:

{data.list.map((item, i) => (

{i === 0 ? 'Now' : new Date(item.dt * 1000).getHours()}

))}

{getSunTime(data.sunrise)}

{getSunTime(data.sunset)}

{Math.floor(today.wind.speed * 10)} km/h

{getWindDirection(today.wind.deg)}, gusts: {today.wind.gust} km/h

) } export default Forecast
